Article Title: Hit wicket? Congress leader stirs row with 'Rohit Sharma is fat' remark ahead of crucial Champions Trophy semifinal
Article Text:
'Asked to delete her posts': Congress

BJP's Lok Sabha dig

Sports minister weighs in

Rohit shouldn’t be in the team: TMC

'With extra pounds or without, has led India to great heights': Shiv Sena (UBT)

'Anti-India mentality appears to be expanding'

BCCI condemns remarks

Mohamed defends her remarks

NEW DELHI: Just a day before India’s semifinal match against New Zealand , a political bouncer rattled Congress after party spokesperson Shama Mohamed took a swing at Indian men's cricket team captain Rohit Sharma , calling him "fat" and a "mediocre captain." Her remarks, made after Rohit got out during India's Champions Trophy clash against New Zealand, have sparked a fiery debate, with politicians from all sides weighing in, and Congress distancing itself from the remark.The Congress leader had taken to social media on Sunday, criticising Sharma's physical fitness and calling him a "mediocre captain." "Rohit Sharma is fat for a sportsman! Needs to lose weight! And of course, the most unimpressive captain India has ever had!" she wrote in a now-deleted post.She went on to compare him unfavourably to cricketing greats like MS Dhoni, Virat Kohli, and Sachin Tendulkar.After facing heavy criticism, Mohamed defended her comments, insisting they were observations rather than body-shaming. "It was a generic tweet about the fitness of a sportsperson. It was not body-shaming," she told ANI, adding that she had every right to express her opinion in a democracy.Congress leader Pawan Khera said that Mohamed had been asked to delete her posts and exercise greater caution in the future. "Her remarks do not reflect the party's position. She has been advised to be more careful," Khera wrote on X.Congress MP Rajani Patil condemned Mohamed's comments, saying, "I personally and the party also will not approve of body-shaming anyone. Talking this way about a sportsperson who represents the country is not right. The party will seek a response from her on this."BJP leader Shehzad Poonawalla attacked the Congress, saying, "Those who have lost 90 elections under the captaincy of Rahul Gandhi are calling Rohit Sharma unimpressive! I guess six ducks in Delhi and 90 election losses is impressive, but winning the T20 World Cup isn’t! Rohit has a brilliant track record as captain."BJP leader Pradeep Bhandari accused Congress of opposing patriotic figures. "The Congress party is trying to send a message that every patriot, who does good for the country, will be opposed by them," he said.Union sports minister Mansukh Mandaviya also weighed in on the controversy and suggested political parties to leave sportspersons alone as they are fully capable of handling their professional lives.In a social media post on X, Mandaviya said, "Congress and TMC should leave sportspersons alone as they are fully capable of handling their professional lives. Remarks made by leaders from these parties, indulging in body shaming and questioning an athlete’s place in the team, are not only deeply shameful but also outright pathetic.""Such comments undermine the hard work and sacrifices that our sportspersons make to represent the country on the global stage," he added.TMC MP Saugata Roy supported Mohamed’s critique, arguing, "I heard that Rohit Sharma's performance has been quite poor. He scored one century, but otherwise gets out cheaply. He shouldn’t be in the team. India wins because of other players."Shiv Sena (UBT) MP Priyanka Chaturvedi took a different stand, saying, "Not an avid cricket fan, but even with my limited interest in the game, I can say that Rohit Sharma, with extra pounds or without, has led India to great heights. It is his work and commitment that matter. Win the trophy, Champion!"Shiv Sena leader Sanjay Nirupam strongly opposed Mohamed’s remarks, calling them disrespectful. "Rohit Sharma and other cricketers like him are heroes of our country. Only Congress people can feel good about criticising such people. The anti-India mentality appears to be expanding from top to bottom."BCCI Secretary Devajit Saikia condemned the remarks and said its "unfortunate" that such remarks were made before the semifinal match."It's very unfortunate this kind of remarks come from such a person who is on a responsible post to our captain, on a meanwhile time when India is playing an ICC tournament and the team is all set to play Semi final," he told ANI.Despite the backlash, Mohamed doubled down on her stance, questioning Sharma’s leadership choices in key matches. She cited his decisions during India's Test series against Australia and the World Cup final loss in Ahmedabad, arguing that his strategic calls had cost the team. "Didn't he move KL Rahul to bat at number 3 at the MCG Test & put himself at number 1, which backfired? Because of that, Shubman Gill was out of the XI. Didn’t we lose the last World Cup in Ahmedabad?"Later while speaking to ANI, Shama said that her comments were not meant to body-shame the Indian captain but were a general observation on athlete fitness.“It was a generic tweet about the fitness of a sportsperson. It was not body-shaming. I always believed a sportsperson should be fit, and I felt he was a bit overweight, so I just tweeted about that,” she said. “I have been attacked for no reason. When I compared him with previous captains, I put in a statement. I have the right. What is wrong in saying? It is a democracy,” she added.
Article Summary: Congress spokesperson shama mohamed took a swing at indian men's cricket team captain rohit sharma. She compared him unfavourably to cricketing greats like ms dhoni, virat kohli, and sachin tendulkar. Mohamed defended her comments, insisting they were observations rather than body-shaming.

Article Title: Hit wicket: Congress draws flak for Rohit remark, left fire-fighting
Article Text:
BJP, pointing to Congress’ record of ‘losing over 90 elections under Rahul Gandhi’s leadership’, claimed that the opposition party was trying to hit the Indian team’s morale at a time when it was in pursuit of the Champions Trophy. Sportspersons should be left alone as they were capable of handling their professional lives, said the Union sports minister

NEW DELHI: Congress spokesperson Shama Mohamed kicked up a row on Monday by body shaming Indian cricket captain Rohit Sharma in a series of social media posts. Faced with an attack from BJP and condemnation across the board, Congress dissociated itself from Mohamed's posts and asked her to delete them.Chairman of Congress's media department Pawan Khera issued a statement, "Shama Mohamed made certain remarks about a cricketing legend that do not reflect the party's position. She has been asked to delete the concerned social media posts from X and has been advised to exercise greater caution in the future. Congress holds the contributions of sporting icons in the highest regard and does not endorse any statements that undermine their legacy."Mohamed deleted her posts but argued that they were generic remarks about the fitness of a sportsperson, which was her right in a democracy. Mohamed posted that she felt Rohit Sharma "was a bit overweight" and wrote about his fitness. "I have been attacked for no reason. When I compared him with previous captains, I put in a statement. I have the right. What is wrong in saying that? It is a democracy," she added. She argued that questioning the weight of a cricketer did not amount to body shaming.Union sports minister Mansukh Mandaviya said sportspersons should be left alone as they were capable of handling their professional lives. "Remarks made by leaders, indulging in body shaming and questioning an athlete's place in the team, are not only deeply shameful but also outright pathetic. Such comments undermine the hard work and sacrifices that our sportspersons make to represent the country on the global stage," he said on X.BJP IT department chief Amit Malviya said Congress, which has "lost over 90 elections" under Rahul Gandhi's leadership, was now "body shaming" Sharma "at a time when our national team is in pursuit of the Champions Trophy". "This is a premeditated put-down to undermine the team's morale at a crucial time. Their disdain for our icons is apparent. They resent a self-confident India," Malviya added.Amid the kerfuffle, Mohamed drew support from TMC MP Saugata Roy, who said she was right in her observation, and that Sharma should not be in Indian team, and definitely not be the captain. "I believe Rohit Sharma should be removed from the team. He has been failing in matches in every format. The captain must earn his place in the team. I feel Rohit should not be in the team, this is my personal opinion," he added.
Article Summary: Bjp, pointing to congress’ record of ‘losing over 90 elections under rahul gandhi’s leadership’, claimed that the opposition party was trying to hit the indian team's morale. Union sports minister mansukh mandaviya said sportspersons should be left alone as they were capable of handling their professional lives.

Article Title: Shama Mohamed Congress leader fat-shames Rohit Sharma in post, deletes it later
Article Text:
Poll Which Is More Important for a Cricketer's Success? Skills and Match Performance Fitness and Endurance

'Being attacked for no reason'

BJP’s hits back

NEW DELHI: Congress spokesperson Shama Mohamed on late Sunday questioned the leadership of Indian men's national cricket team captain Rohit Sharma . Reacting to India's match against New Zealand in the ongoing Champions Trophy, Shama labelled Rohit "fat" and called him a "mediocre captain"."Rohit Sharma is fat for a sportsman! Needs to lose weight! And of course, the most unimpressive captain India has ever had!" the Congress spokesperson wrote in a social media post. After facing backlash, the Congress leader deleted her post.She went further in another post, questioning Sharma’s abilities compared to past cricketing legends. "What is so world-class about him when compared to his predecessors like Ganguly, Tendulkar, Dravid, Dhoni, Kohli, Kapil Dev, Shastri & the rest? He is a mediocre captain as well as a mediocre player who got lucky to be the captain of India."Following the backlash, Shama defended her remarks questioning Rohit's decision to promote himself to the opening spot during India's Test match against Australia, a match that the Men in Blue ultimately lost."Didn't he move KL Rahul to bat at number 3 at the MCG Test & put himself at number 1 which backfired totally ! Wasn't that a selfish move ? Because of that Shubam Gill was out of the XI . Didn't we lose the last World Cup which took place in Ahmedabad? I have compared him to our previous captains," she wrote in another post.Speaking to the news agency ANI, Shama clarified that her remarks were "generic" and were not intended to shame the captain of the Indian men's cricket team. Further defending her comments, she said that, in her opinion, "sportspersons should be fit," and added that she was being "attacked for no reason" over her statements."It was a generic tweet about the fitness of a sportsperson. It was not body-shaming. I always believed a sportsperson should be fit, and I felt he was a bit overweight, so I just tweeted about that," she said."I have been attacked for no reason. When I compared him with previous captains, I put in a statement. I have the right. What is wrong in saying? It is a democracy," she added.BJP’s Shehzad Poonawalla was quick to respond, taking a dig at the Congress party's electoral failures. "Those who have lost 90 elections under the captaincy of Rahul Gandhi are calling the captaincy of Rohit Sharma unimpressive!" he remarked.Poonawalla also defended Sharma’s track record, referencing his recent achievements. "I guess six ducks in Delhi and 90 election losses is impressive, but winning the T20 World Cup isn’t! Rohit has a brilliant track record as captain, by the way!"Meanwhile, on the field, India secured a crucial victory over New Zealand, winning by 44 runs to top Group A. Shreyas Iyer’s composed 79 and Varun Chakravarthy’s five-wicket haul helped India set up a semifinal clash against Australia in the Champions Trophy.
Article Summary: Congress spokesperson shama mohamed questioned the leadership of indian men's national cricket team captain rohit sharma. Shama labelled sharma "fat" and called him a "mediocre captain" after facing backlash, the congress leader deleted her post. On the field, india secured a crucial victory over new zealand, winning by 44 runs to top group a.

Article Title: Will Jimmy Butler play tonight against the Charlotte Hornets? Latest update on the Golden State Warriors star's injury report (March 3, 2025)
Article Text:
Is Jimmy Butler playing tonight? (Image via Benny Sieu-Imagn)

Is Jimmy Butler playing tonight? Golden State Warriors injury report for tonight’s game against the Charlotte Hornets (March 3, 2025)

Warriors injury report March 3 (Image via NBA)

Charlotte Hornets injury report for tonight’s game against the Golden State Warriors (March 3, 2025)

How to watch the Golden State Warriors play tonight against the Charlotte Hornets (March 3, 2025)

Jimmy Butler, the Golden State Warriors ' key forward, is listed as probable for Monday night’s game against the Charlotte Hornets due to a back injury. The Warriors, holding a 32-28 record, will face the struggling Hornets (14-45) at the Spectrum Center in Charlotte, North Carolina, at 7 p.m. ET. Butler’s availability is a significant factor for Golden State as they aim to maintain their playoff push. Jimmy Butler has been exhibiting his defensive prowess and clutch performances, which has made him a vital contributor to the Warriors’ success this season. His probable status suggests he is likely to suit up, but his minutes could be monitored to avoid aggravating the injury. The Warriors are already dealing with other injury concerns, including Jonathan Kuminga, who is out with an ankle injury, and Quinten Post, who is questionable with an ankle issue.The Warriors’ offense, led by Stephen Curry, averages 113.0 points per game, ranking 16th in the NBA. Curry, who is averaging 24.1 points per game, will need support from Butler and others to overcome a Hornets team that, despite their poor record, has shown resilience at home. Golden State’s defense, allowing 111.4 points per game (10th in the league), will also rely on Jimmy Butler’s presence to contain Charlotte’s leading scorer, LaMelo Ball, who averages 26.1 points per game.For the Charlotte Hornets , injuries have plagued their season, with key players like Grant Williams and Brandon Miller out for the year. However, Miles Bridges, listed as probable due to illness, is expected to play and will be crucial for Charlotte’s chances. Bridges averages 20.6 points and 7.7 rebounds per game, making him a focal point of the Hornets’ offense.The game will be broadcast on NBCS-BA and FDSSE, with live streaming available on Fubo. Fans can also engage with FanDuel Fantasy for daily fantasy action.As the Warriors look to capitalize on their +100 scoring differential, Butler’s health remains a storyline to watch. His ability to play through the back injury could be the difference in a tight contest. Golden State’s depth will be tested, but with Jimmy Butler likely on the court, they remain favorites to secure a crucial road win.
Article Summary: Jimmy butler, the golden state warriors'key forward, is listed as probable for monday night’s game against the charlotte hornets due to a back injury. The warriors, holding a 32-28 record, will face the struggling hornets (14-45) at the spectrum center in charlotte, north carolina, at 7 p.m. Et.

Article Title: NBA Offseason Rumors: Los Angeles Lakers might sign 8x All-Star and NBA Champion; possible reunion with Luka Doncic?
Article Text:
Luka Doncic and LeBron James (Image via Getty Images)

“He often talked about their families being close, spending time off the court enjoying each other's presence, and just a pure enjoyment on both of their faces when they are on the court.”

Luka Doncic (Image via AP)

“All in all, Dallas made a move to try winning the NBA Finals, but there is a serious connection between Irving being 'out-of-the-loop' in Dallas to where he joins two of his former teammates in Los Angeles,”

The Los Angeles Lakers made headlines earlier this year by acquiring Luka Doncic in a blockbuster trade with the Dallas Mavericks. While the Slovenian superstar has quickly become a fan favorite, the Lakers could further solidify their roster this offseason by reuniting Doncic with a familiar face: Kyrie Irving Irving, an eight-time All-Star and NBA champion with the Cleveland Cavaliers in 2016, shares a strong bond with Doncic. Their partnership in Dallas, though short-lived, was electric. “(Kyrie) Irving and Doncic were basically two peas in a pod, with Irving outright stating on numerous occasions how dominant of a player Doncic was as well as how good of a friend he was,” wrote Daniel Alameda of The Wrightway Sports Network.During their time together, Kyrie Irving ’s flashy ball-handling and clutch shot-making perfectly complemented Doncic’s methodical and strategic approach. Despite losing to the Boston Celtics, the pair guided the Mavericks to a 50-32 record and an unexpected trip to the NBA Finals the previous season. The couple showed a lot of promise despite the setback, so the prospect of a reunion in Los Angeles was fascinating.The Los Angeles Lakers , who traded Anthony Davis for Doncic in February, are now focused on building a championship-caliber team around their new star. Bringing in Kyrie Irving, who also shares a strong relationship with LeBron James, could be a game-changer.Alameda added.Kyrie Irving’s experience, leadership, and chemistry with Doncic make him an ideal target for the Los Angeles Lakers in free agency. If the franchise can secure the $120 million guard, it would not only boost their title hopes for the 2025-26 season but also send a clear message to Doncic that they are committed to building a contender around him.Also read: NBA Offseason Rumors: Golden State Warriors might sign $60 million Chicago Bulls center to support Stephen Curry in his remaining years As the offseason approaches, all eyes will be on the Los Angeles Lakers’ front office to see if they can pull off this high-stakes reunion.
Article Summary: The los angeles lakers made headlines earlier this year by acquiring luka doncic in a blockbuster trade with the dallas mavericks. Kyrie irving irving, an eight-time all-star and nba champion with the cleveland cavaliers in 2016, shares a strong bond with the slovenian star.

Article Title: WWE Monday Night RAW Preview and Streaming Details (3/3/25): Full Match Card, Show Highlights, How to Watch, and More
Article Text:
(Image Via X)

WWE Monday Night RAW: Confirmed match card

Rhea Ripley vs. Iyo Sky – Women’s World Championship match.

War Raiders vs. The Creed Brothers – World Tag Team Championship match.

Lyra Valkyria vs. Ivy Nile – Women’s Intercontinental Championship match.

WWE Heavyweight Champion Gunther, Seth Rollins, and CM Punk are set to appear.

Show highlights of WWE Monday Night Raw (March 3, 2025)

Where to get tickets for WWE Monday Night RAW?

How to watch WWE Monday Night RAW? (March 3, 2025)

Also Read:

After the intense Elimination Chamber PLE, the next edition of WWE Monday Night Raw is all set to feature an action-packed night with a surprising storyline, intense feud, and more. The show will mainly feature the developments that transpired at the premium live event in Toronto.The March 3, 2025 episode of Monday Night Raw will emanate live from the KeyBank Center in Buffalo, New York, USA, and will be available on Netflix at 8ET/5PT, and other broadcasting platforms globally.The 03/25 edition of WWE Monday Night Raw promises major development as it will feature superstars like Rhea Ripley, Seth Rollins , Lyra Valkyria, CM Punk , and more. It is said that Bianca Belair will also appear to witness which opponent she will face at the upcoming WrestleMania 41.Let’s take a look at the match preview, streaming details, match card, highlights and more—After Bianca Belair clinched the Women’s Elimination Chamber title and punched her ticket to WrestleMania 41, now it is time for Rhea Ripley and Iyo Sky to confront each other and fight for their place in the Shows of Show.Besides, Belair will also be present to witness the match between the champions to determine who she will eventually lock horns with at the upcoming WrestleMania event.Apart from Ripley and Iyo Sky, another champion Lyra Valkyria will also lock horns with Ivy Nile for the Women's Intercontinental gold and the Creed Brother will be facing Erik and Ivar of The War Raiders for the World Tag Team Championship on RAW tonight.The Monday Night RAW will also feature CM Punk, Seth Rollins, and Gunther. CM Punk was eliminated by John Cena at the Elimination Chamber . But, Punk lost his run to the WrestleMania title after Seth Rollins attacked him after being eliminated by both Cena and Punk.Fans can get the Monday Night RAW tickets on TicketMaster. As per reports, a single ticket to the match costs around $44.40 to $486.85 while two tickets cost $44.40 to $797.30.-Tonight's episode of WWE Monday Night RAW will air live in the United States at 8 PM ET on Netflix.-In Alaska, Hawaii, and Puerto Rico, WWE RAW airs live every Monday at 8 PM ET, 7 PM CT, and 4 PM PT every Monday on Netflix.-In Canada, the show will be broadcast live every Monday at 8 PM ET on Netflix.-Fans in the UK and Ireland can watch the show live at 1 AM GMT every Tuesday on Netflix.-In India, RAW will be available live every Tuesday at 6:30 AM IST on Sony Sports Network, including Sony Liv, Sony Ten 1, Sony Ten 1 HD, Sony Ten 3, Sony Ten 4, and Sony Ten 4 HD.-Viewers in Saudi Arabia can watch the show live at 4 AM AST every Tuesday on Netflix.-In Australia, the show will be broadcast live every Tuesday at 12 PM AEDT on Netflix.-Fans in France can tune in live every Tuesday at 2 AM CET on AB1.
Article Summary: The march 3, 2025 episode of monday night raw will emanate live from the keybank center in buffalo, new york, usa, and will be available on netflix at 8et/5pt. Wwe heavyweight champion gunther, seth rollins, and cm punk are set to appear. It is said that bianca belair will also appear to witness which opponent she will face at the upcoming wrestlemania 41.

Article Title: Carmelo Anthony hails Jimmy Butler’s winning streak with Golden State Warriors alongside Draymond Green: “They're dogs out there on the defensive end”
Article Text:
Jimmy Butler and Carmelo Anthony. Image via: Lynne Sladky | Bryan Terry/The Oklahoman / AP

Carmelo Anthony

Jimmy Butler

Golden State Warriors

Draymond Green

Carmelo Anthony praised Jimmy Butler’s tenure with the Golden State Warriors



Draymond Green and Jimmy Butler. Image via: Kyle Terada-Imagn Images

NBA legendhas recently shared his thoughts on’s performance at the, as he has found his rhythm pushing the team in the Bay area to clinch more wins. When the Golden State Warriors acquired Butler, many questioned whether he would fit into their system. However, nearly a month after the trade deadline, Butler has given the "Dubs" a much-needed spark, elevating them from a struggling play-in contender to a legitimate playoff threat. He has been one of the lethal stars in the league, and the partnership withmade them more powerful. Carmelo Anthony has recently shared his thoughts on Jimmy Butle r’s new tenure with the Golden State Warriors. During a recent episode of 7 PM in Brooklyn, 10-time NBA All-Star Anthony praised how Butler brought life back to the team. “Jimmy gives them something different,” Melo said. “Jimmy gives you another Draymond on the defensive end. So Jimmy can now guard the players, and Draymond can be the safety now, which he is very elite at being the safety. So now, Jimmy could be as aggressive on the defensive end. He could be in the passing lanes. He got Draymond talking to him. That’s the type of sh** that Jimmy needs to be around. And they’re dogs out there on the defensive end.”The numbers back up Melo’s assessment. In January 2025, the Warriors ranked 25th in the league in defensive rating. Since Butler’s arrival, they’ve skyrocketed to No. 3 overall in February 2025. The team’s newfound defensive identity has been a game-changer, helping them secure key wins in the second half of the season.Beyond his defensive contributions, Butler has also provided a steadying force on offense. Melo pointed out how Butler's ability to slow the game down by drawing fouls gives Stephen Curry much-needed breathers. His post-game also adds another dimension to the Warriors’ offensive sets, allowing them to attack teams in different ways.“Jimmy thrives in that role of like being just a role player in a sense,” Anthony said. “That’s when you gonna see the best Jimmy. And he wants to be the complimentary guy. He’s a star, but he wants to be the complimentary guy to Steph. And why not?”So far, the results speak for themselves. Butler recently became the first player in Warriors history to record 120+ points, 30+ rebounds, and 30+ assists in his first six games with the franchise. In eight games, he's averaging 16.4 points, 5.8 rebounds, 5.6 assists, and 1.3 steals per game. Undoubtedly, it is impressive numbers for someone seamlessly adapting to a new system.However, Butler’s arrival in the Golden State was far from a cakewalk. Before the trade, his relationship with the Miami Heat had deteriorated, leading him to demand a move.Anthony had a word of caution for Butler. He referenced former NBA point guard Stephon Marbury, whose public feud with the New York Knicks led to a steep decline in his career. “Chill out,” Anthony advised Butler, suggesting that his heated dispute with Heat president Pat Riley could hurt his trade prospects.Also Read: Anthony Edwards' blunt message to Barack Obama gets big reaction from Carmelo Anthony The Heat's reluctance to lower their asking price only complicated matters, as the market for Butler wasn't as robust as expected. In the end, the Warriors capitalized on the situation, bringing in a player who has already made a significant impact. Considering current stats, it is fair to say that Butler’s move to the Bay Area has proven to be a major success.
Article Summary: Carmelo anthony praised jimmy butler’s tenure with the golden state warriors. Butler has given the warriors a much-needed spark, elevating them from a struggling play-in contender to a legitimate playoff threat. Butler recently became the first player in warriors history to record 120+ points, 30+ rebounds, and 30+ assists in his first six games.

Article Title: Road to WrestleMania 41: The Biggest Matches and Storylines for WWE's Show of Shows
Article Text:
(Image Via WWE/Getty Images)

The most anticipatory match: Cody Rhodes vs. John Cena

John Cena refuses to address attack of Cody Rhodes: Elimination Chamber 2025 Post-show highlights

WWE Women's Championship: Tiffany Stratton vs. Charlotte Flair

WWE Heavyweight Championship: Jey Uso vs. Gunther

Jey Uso chooses to challenge Gunther at WrestleMania: Raw highlights, Feb. 10, 2025

Who will clash with Bianca Belair at WrestleMania 41?

Bianca Belair gets confronted by Rhea Ripley and IYO SKY: Elimination Chamber 2025 highlights

Will IShowSpeed and Travis Scott feature at WrestleMania 41?

Also Read:

After an action-packed and high-octane match at the recently held Elimination Chamber PLE on March 1, 2025, at the Rogers Centre, Toronto, in Canada, WWE is now busy making huge storyline development and comeback for the upcoming The Shows of Show, WrestleMania 41 .WWE WrestleMania 41 will run from April 19, 2025, to April 20, 2025, and will emanate live from Allegiant Stadium in the Las Vegas suburb of Paradise, Nevada.As the Greatest Spectacle in Sports Entertainment is approaching soon and already knocking on the door, the WWE Universe and fans are waiting in anticipation to witness heated rivalries, twisted storylines, shocking comebacks, and most importantly some intense feuds among top-tier heavyweight champions.Let’s take a sneak peek at the upcoming biggest matches and storylines that will feature in the Show of Shows—WWE fans witnessed the most unforgettable moments at the Eliminations Chamber PLE after John Cena turned heel for the first time against Cody Rhodes and got embroiled in an intense fight with him, pinning Rhodes down inside the ring in a pool of blood.The Cenation leader who has kicked off his farewell tour on WWE, has sold his soul and joined hands with The Rock after Rhodes vehemently insulted and criticized The Rock on the Elimination Chamber PLE.Besides, John Cena also won the Men’s Elimination Chamber eliminating CM Punk and Seth Rollins, which earned him the ticket to WrestleMania. After the intense feud Rhodes had at the premium live event, it is very apparent that Rhodes will lock horns in a fierce battle with the Cenation leader.However, his win at WrestleMania feels skeptical as The Rock has joined hands with Cena to fight against Rhodes. Now, the biggest question is, who will join Rhodes to help him claim the title?WrestleMania 41 will also feature The WWE Women's Championship as Tiffany Stratton will fight against 2025 Royal Rumble winner Charlotte Flair . Previously, Stratton cashed in her Money in the Bank contract against Nia Jax and defeated her to win the title on the Jan. 3 edition of SmackDown.On the other hand, the 14-time champion Flair returned from injury at the 2025 Royal Rumble and won the match, securing a championship opportunity of her choosing.According to WWE, The “Queen” also spoke with Women's World Champion Rhea Ripley and NXT Women's Champion Giulia before choosing to challenge Stratton on The Grandest Stage of Them All.Another match which is already announced by WrestleMania is Gunther vs. Jey Uso. Heavyweight champion Gunther is set to get involved in an intense clash against Jey Uso in a World Heavyweight Championship Match at WrestleMania According to WWE, Jey Uso has become one of the most popular Superstars in WWE, winning the 2025 Royal Rumble Match. His victory at the Rumble earned him the privilege to choose the World Champion who would fight against him.When Gunther attacked him from behind on the February 10 edition of Raw, Jey immediately announced that he would challenge The Ring General at The Show of Shows. The biggest question now lingers is, who will claim the World Heavyweight Championship at The Showcase of the Immortals?After Bianca Belair clinched the Women’s Elimination Chamber title and punched her ticket to WrestleMania 41, now it is time for Rhea Ripley and Iyo Sky to confront each other and fight for their place in the Shows of Show. Rhea Ripley and Iyo Sky will lock horns at the March 3, 2025, edition of RAW.The wrestler who will win on the Raw edition will face off against Bianca Belair at the Show of Shows. Besides, Belair will also be present to witness the match between the champions to determine who she will eventually lock horns with at the upcoming WrestleMania event.The Youtuber IShowSpeed entered the Royal Rumble 2025, after a request from Triple H and got eliminated immediately after receiving Bron Breakker’s devastating spear. After he was severely injured at the Royal Rumble by Bron Breakker, the US-based Youtuber vowed never to be back on WWE, but now it seems the young sensation has changed his mind to come in support of Rhodes while reacting to John Cena’s heel turn on Cody Rhodes.After what happened to Cody Rhodes at the Elimination Chamber PLE, YouTube sensation IShowSpeed has extended his support to the American Nightmare. IShowSpeed extended his support for Rhodes during the latest live stream reacting to John Cena ’s shocking transition and said that he would join Rhodes to help him win against Cena and The Rock.On the other hand, Travis Scott, who featured with The Rock and Cena to beat Cody Rhodes at the Elimination Chamber PLE, is preparing to feature in WWE. As per reports, Scott has been undergoing wrestling training at the school of a WWE legend.Besides, Scott also received a new hardcore title belt, and his single “4×4” is now the Monday Night Raw theme. There is a possible future of Scott getting featured at WWE, escorting Cena and The Rock, however, his re-entry at WrestleMania 41 has not been confirmed yet.
Article Summary: Wwe wrestlemania 41 will run from april 19, 2025, to april 20, 2025. It will emanate live from allegiant stadium in the las vegas suburb of paradise, nevada. Tiffany stratton will fight against 2025 royal rumble winner charlotte flair. Heavyweight champion gunther is set to get involved in an intense clash against jey uso.

Article Title: “It’s Unbelievable” — Luka Doncic Sees Himself in a Melrose Avenue Mural Alongside the Late Los Angeles Lakers Legend Kobe Bryant
Article Text:
(Image Source - Getty Images)

Artist Arutyun Gozukuchikyan Honors Luka Doncic and Kobe Bryant with a Beautiful Lakers-Themed Mural

Los Angeles Lakers See Immediate Success After Trading for Luka Doncic with a Remarkable 12 Wins in 14 Games

Luka Doncic Proves He Can Thrive in High-Stakes Moments with a Standout Performance

Criticism from the Dallas Mavericks Does Not Stop Luka Doncic from Thriving with the Los Angeles Lakers

The Los Angeles Lakers took a huge risk by trading Anthony Davis for Luka Doncic , and it definitely raised eyebrows across the NBA. However, with a remarkable 12-2 record since the deal, it’s clear that the risk has paid off. Doncic has been a game-changer on the court, and his instant chemistry with LeBron James has put the Lakers back in the championship conversation. Off the court, he’s already becoming a part of L.A. lore, with a vibrant mural of him next to Kobe Bryant on Melrose Avenue. "It’s Unbelievable," Doncic remarked, embracing this exciting new path.Outside of the court, Doncic's arrival has encouraged Los Angeles artists. A beautiful painting on Melrose Avenue captures a unique conversation between Doncic and the late Kobe Bryant from December 2019. Designed by artist Arutyun Gozukuchikyan, the mural shows the two giving a post-game high-five to represent a passing of the torch to the future generation of Lakers' brilliance. Declaring great respect for Bryant, Doncic said, "I just wish Kobe and Gigi were here to see this moment."The NBA scene changed drastically on February 2, 2025 when the Los Angeles Lakers bought Luka Doncic from the Dallas Mavericks in exchange for Anthony Davis. With this calculated action, the Lakers hoped to strengthen their roster and inspire once again their championship aspirations. Doncic has been crucial in the Lakers' outstanding performance since he joined the squad, helping to explain a 12-2 record over their past 14 games.Especially remarkable is his collaboration with LeBron James as both players improve their skills and inspire a fresh team spirit.Doncic demonstrates exceptional court impact through his play. In his latest match against the Los Angeles Clippers he delivered an exceptional performance which resulted in the Lakers' 108-102 victory while he scored 29 points. The team won its third-place Western Conference position after beating the Los Angeles Clippers by maintaining a 38-21 season record through six consecutive wins. The ability of Doncic to thrive under pressure along with his skills stands as proof of his competence and resilience.The transition period has not been problem-free. Doncic faced criticism from the Dallas Mavericks team for his off-court weight issues and lifestyle choices after the trade occurred. Doncic has displayed professional behavior along with steady focus that enables him to integrate smoothly into the Lakers team without losing their respect. Doncic has formed a partnership with LeBron James which many observers compare to legendary Lakers duels from the past.Also Read : Luka Doncic Celebrates His Birthday With a Win Against the Los Angeles Clippers, the Los Angeles Lakers Move to 4th Position
Article Summary: The los angeles lakers took a huge risk by trading anthony davis for luka doncic. However, with a remarkable 12-2 record since the deal, it’s clear that the risk has paid off. His instant chemistry with lebron james has put the lakers back in the championship conversation.

Article Title: Bronny James steals the spotlight with his viral moment from the bench
Article Text:
Image via Imagn Images

Bronny James' unexpected bench moment sparks viral reaction

Bronny James , the Lakers rookie and son of NBA star LeBron James, made headlines during the Lakers-Clippers game but not for his basketball skills. A video showed Bronny moved from the bench to sit among fans during the game, sparking laughs and confusion online. While the Lakers won 108-102, Bronny’s unexpected “courtside experience” became the talk of the internet, overshadowing the team’s big victory.During the Los Angeles Lakers-Clippers game, Bronny James started on the bench but was later moved to sit behind the team. A video posted by Bleacher Report showed him sitting next to fans in premium seats. The clip quickly went viral on TikTok, racking up over 2.1 million views.With key players like Austin Reaves and Rui Hachimura injured, some fans hoped Bronny might get more playing time. But by the second quarter, it was clear he wouldn’t play. To make space on the bench, Bronny was shifted to sit behind the team, blending in with the crowd.Despite the focus on Bronny, the Lakers had a great night, beating the Clippers 108-102. Luka Doncic led the charge with 29 points, helping the team improve to a 38-21 record. The win kept the Lakers in second place in the Western Conference, showing they’re serious contenders this season.Bronny has played very little this season, averaging just 4.2 minutes per game. His last appearance was on February 12, before the NBA All-Star break. However, he’s been impressive in the G League, averaging 21.9 points, 5.4 rebounds, and 5 assists in seven games. While his NBA minutes are limited, his potential is clear.Also read: Bronny James unveils exclusive Nike LeBron Nxxt Gen AMPD PE in South Bay Lakers vs Valley Suns matchup Bronny James’ courtside seat with fans became the internet’s favorite moment from the Lakers-Clippers game. While the Lakers celebrated their win, Bronny’s viral clip showed his ability to handle the spotlight even when it’s not about basketball. Fans are sure that these funny incidents will soon make this rookie an NBA superstar.
Article Summary: Bronny james started on the bench but was later moved to sit behind the team. A video posted by bleacher report showed him sitting next to fans in premium seats. The clip quickly went viral on tiktok, racking up over 2.1 million views.

Article Title: Is a break-up on the way? Taylor Swift reportedly advised to distance herself from Travis Kelce amid growing backlash and its impact on the Chiefs' TE
Article Text:
Image via Getty Images

Taylor Swift urged to keep her personal and professional brands separate

Taylor Swift is reportedly coming under more pressure to keep her personal life separate from her professional image. Some, according to insiders, think that her very public romance with Travis Kelce might be having a detrimental impact on her reputation. The debate was heightened after she received boos at the Super Bowl—a moment that some waved off as friendly ribbing, while others interpreted it as a sign that her involvement in the NFL universe isn't welcomed by everyone.Taylor Swift is said to be increasingly being urged to keep her personal and professional brands separate. Sources claim that certain advisers of hers are of the view that her celebrity romance with Travis Kelce might be damaging her carefully crafted persona. Disapproval mounted after she was booed at the Super Bowl—a spectacle that some ridiculed as light-hearted taunts, but others interpreted as definitive proof that her growing presence within the NFL community isn't for everyone. Since Swift is arguably one of the most powerful entities in the music industry, a few insiders fret that her visibility with the world of sports would bring unnecessary turmoil to her profession.At the same time, Kelce is also receiving flak, especially from fans of the Kansas City Chiefs questioning if his priorities on football have been diluted. His disappointing outing in the last game of the season against the Philadelphia Eagles only added fuel to the fire, with some of them positing that his life outside the football field, including his relationship with Swift, might be affecting his performance.Once regarded as an untouchable leader on the field, Kelce is now under scrutiny for possibly letting distractions interfere with his play. Since the couple continues to be in the spotlight, both Swift and Kelce find themselves at the center of discussions regarding whether their romanceTaylor Swift and Travis Kelce, formerly the epitome of power couples connecting music and sport, now face a reversal of public perception that could be hard to discount. Rumors of a possible wedding later in the year only served to heighten debate, with some industry sources warning that cross-pollinating their brands to such an extent might prove to have unforeseen effects. With their relationship making up-page news every day, the test is to keep their romance alive while keeping their respective careers intact.“This whole situation is creating a weird tension between her and Travis, especially since this is their first real bump in the road,” a source told Radar Online. “Until now, it’s been nothing but good times! You can only imagine the awkward discussions happening behind the scenes about when it’s appropriate for them to be seen together and how they’re supposed to act. Definitely not the romantic vibe they were hoping for!”Also Read: Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce losing their popularity as Super Bowl loss shifts spotlight away Taylor Swift has been pulled into a surprise legal battle with her close friends Blake Lively, Ryan Reynolds, and former co-star of Lively's Justin Baldoni. Court papers indicate that Baldoni was pressured when Lively mentioned Swift and Reynolds as her "dragons" in a creative dispute over the It Ends With Us movie.Although Taylor Swift was reportedly not involved, her perceived power was being used as leverage. Fed up with the unwanted connection, she perceives it as a possible threat to her image. Consequently, part of the insiders is now calling on her to distance herself from Lively, just as she's being advised to do regarding her affair with Travis Kelce.
Article Summary: Taylor swift urged to keep her personal and professional brands separate. Some, according to insiders, think that her very public romance with travis kelce might be having a detrimental impact on her reputation. The debate was heightened after she received boos at the super bowl.

Article Title: Will LaMelo Ball play tonight against the Golden State Warriors? Latest update on the Charlotte Hornets star's injury report (March 3, 2025)
Article Text:
Is LaMelo Ball playing tonight? (Image via Getty)

Is LaMelo Ball playing tonight? Charlotte Hornets injury report for tonight’s game against the Golden State Warriors (March 3, 2025)

Hornets injury report March 3 (Image via NBA)

Golden State Warriors injury report for tonight’s game against the Charlotte Hornets (March 3, 2025)

How to watch the Charlotte Hornets play tonight against the Golden State Warriors (March 3, 2025)

The Charlotte Hornets are set to host the Golden State Warriors on Monday, March 3, at the Spectrum Center, but all eyes are on the injury report, particularly the status of star point guard LaMelo Ball. The Hornets, struggling with a 14-45 record, have seven players listed on the injury report, including Ball, whose absence could further complicate their chances against a competitive Warriors squad. LaMelo Ball is listed on the team’s projected starters and he is absent from the team’s injury report. So, he will be playing tonight against the Warriors. Ball who leads the Hornets with a team-high 26.1 points per game, has been a bright spot in an otherwise challenging season for Charlotte. However, his recent injury has raised concerns about his availability and the team’s ability to compete without their primary scorer and playmaker. While the official injury report does not specify Ball’s condition, his absence from the list suggests he may be playing through discomfort or managing a minor issue. The Hornets ’ injury woes extend beyond LaMelo Ball. Grant Williams and Brandon Miller are out for the season with ACL and wrist injuries, respectively, while Josh Okogie and Tre Mann are also sidelined. Miles Bridges, listed as probable due to illness, is expected to play, providing some relief for a team already thin on depth.On the Warriors’ side, the injury report is less severe but still impactful. Jonathan Kuminga is out with an ankle injury, while Quinten Post is questionable for the same reason. Jimmy Butler, listed as probable with a back issue, is expected to suit up, bolstering Golden State’s lineup.The Warriors, with a 32-28 record, have been consistent offensively, ranking 16th in the league with 113.0 points per game. Stephen Curry remains their cornerstone, averaging 24.1 points and leading the NBA with 4.5 three-pointers made per game. His presence, combined with the Hornets’ defensive struggles, could spell trouble for Charlotte, especially if LaMelo Ball is limited or unavailable.For the Hornets, Bridges has been a key contributor, averaging 20.6 points and 7.7 rebounds over the last 20 games. His ability to step up in Ball’s potential absence will be critical. However, Charlotte’s overall performance has been lackluster, ranking 28th in scoring (105.2 points per game) and 13th in points allowed (112.8).As the Hornets prepare to face the Warriors, LaMelo Ball’s status remains a focal point. His presence on the court could provide a much-needed spark, but his absence would leave a significant void in Charlotte’s offense. Fans can catch the game at 7 p.m. ET on NBCS-BA and FDSSE or stream it live on Fubo.Also read: Will Jimmy Butler play tonight against the Charlotte Hornets? Latest update on the Golden State Warriors star's injury report (March 3, 2025) For now, the Hornets’ hopes hinge on Ball’s health and the team’s ability to overcome a growing list of injuries in a season that continues to test their resilience.
Article Summary: The charlotte hornets host the golden state warriors on monday, march 3, at the spectrum center. All eyes are on the injury report, particularly the status of star point guard lamelo ball. The hornets, struggling with a 14-45 record, have seven players listed on the injury report, including ball.

Article Title: Will Joel Embiid play tonight against the Portland Trail Blazers? Latest update on the Philadelphia 76ers star's injury report (March 3, 2025)
Article Text:
Is Joel Embiid playing tonight? (Image via AP Photo/Frank Franklin II)

Is Joel Embiid playing tonight? Philadelphia 76ers injury report for tonight’s game against the Portland Trail blazers (March 3, 2025)

76ers injury report March 3 (Image via NBA)

Portland Trail Blazers injury report for tonight’s game against the Philadelphia 76ers (March 3, 2025)

How to watch the Philadelphia 76ers play tonight against the Portland Trail Blazers (March 3, 2025)?

The Philadelphia 76ers will face the Portland Trail Blazers on Monday, March 3, at the Wells Fargo Center, but they’ll do so without their star center, Joel Embiid, who has been officially ruled out for the remainder of the season due to a knee injury. Embiid’s absence is a significant blow to the struggling 76ers, who are already dealing with multiple injuries as they prepare for the 7 p.m. ET tip-off. Joel Embiid , a former MVP and the cornerstone of the 76ers’ roster, has been sidelined since late January after suffering a meniscus tear in his left knee. Despite initial hopes for a potential return, the team confirmed on Monday that he will not play again this season.The 76ers’ injury report is lengthy, with four other players listed alongside Embiid. Eric Gordon (wrist), Jared McCain (meniscus), and Kyle Lowry (hip) are all out, while Paul George remains questionable with a groin injury. These absences have left the team shorthanded as they try to navigate a challenging season. Philadelphia currently sits at 21-38, ranking 26th in the league in scoring with 109.2 points per game. Tyrese Maxey has stepped up in Joel Embiid’s absence, leading the team with 26.7 points per game, good for sixth in the NBA. Kelly Oubre Jr. has also been a bright spot, averaging 17.8 points and 7.2 rebounds over the last 20 games. However, the team’s struggles on the boards—ranking last in the league with 39.2 rebounds per game—have been a glaring issue.On the other side, the Trail Blazers enter the game with their own injury concerns. Robert Williams III (knee), Matisse Thybulle (ankle), Deandre Ayton (calf), and Jerami Grant (calf) are all out, leaving Portland without key contributors. Anfernee Simons, who leads the team with 18.7 points per game, will be relied upon heavily to carry the offensive load.The matchup between the 76ers and Trail Blazers will be a battle of two teams fighting to stay afloat amid injury-plagued seasons. For Philadelphia, the focus now shifts to the future, as Joel Embiid’s recovery and the team’s offseason moves will be critical in determining their trajectory for the 2025-26 season.Fans can catch the game live on KATU, KUNP, and NBCS-PH, or stream it on Fubo. Regional restrictions may apply.
Article Summary: The philadelphia 76ers will face the portland trail blazers on monday, march 3, at the wells fargo center. Joel embiid has been officially ruled out for the remainder of the season due to a knee injury. The 76ers’ injury report is lengthy, with four other players listed alongside embiids.

Article Title: Sidney Crosby cracks NHL’s Top 10 All-Time Assists list​
Article Text:
(Image via Getty)

Sidney Crosby's Top 10 Career Highlights

Sidney Crosby surpasses Gordie Howe on All-Time Assists list

Pittsburgh Penguins captain Sidney Crosby's legacy keeps growing

Also Read:

Sidney Crosby continues to etch his name into hockey history , reaching yet another monumental milestone. The Pittsburgh Penguins captain has officially entered the top ten on the NHL’s all-time assists leaderboard, surpassing legends of the game. As the highest-assisting active player, Crosby’s remarkable vision and playmaking ability remain unmatched, and with games left in the season, he’s poised to climb even higher.In Sunday’s thrilling 6-5 overtime battle against the Toronto Maple Leafs, Crosby tallied a goal and two assists. While the Penguins fell short, Crosby’s performance propelled him past hockey icon Gordie Howe, giving him 1,050 career assists.Now ranked 10th all-time, Crosby leads all active NHL players in assists and holds a staggering lead of over 200 assists ahead of the next closest active player, Patrick Kane, who sits at 836. Evgeni Malkin , Crosby’s longtime Penguins teammate, follows closely behind with 827 assists, ranking third among active players.With 19 games remaining this season, Crosby has a legitimate shot at climbing even higher on the prestigious list. He is just 13 assists away from surpassing Steve Yzerman , who amassed all 1,063 of his career assists with a single franchise, the Detroit Red Wings. Looking beyond, Crosby needs 29 more assists to leapfrog Adam Oates, who currently holds the eighth spot with 1,079.Every game moving forward presents an opportunity for Crosby to continue rewriting history. His unparalleled vision, passing precision, and hockey IQ have made him one of the most prolific playmakers of all time, and he shows no signs of slowing down.The Penguins are set to return to action on Tuesday night as they hit the road to face the Colorado Avalanche. Puck drop is scheduled for 9 p.m. ET, and all eyes will be on Crosby as he continues his climb up the NHL record books.Sidney Crosby’s latest achievement is just another testament to his incredible career. As he continues to rack up assists, he not only solidifies his place among the game’s greatest but also sets an example for future generations. With his skill, determination, and leadership, Crosby’s impact on the sport will be felt long after he hangs up his skates. For now, the journey continues, and hockey fans eagerly await his next milestone.
Article Summary: Sidney crosby surpasses gordie howe on nhl's all-time assists list. Pittsburgh penguins captain now has 1,050 career assists. Crosby leads all active nhl players in assists with over 200. He is just 13 assists away from surpassing steve yzerman and adam oates.

Article Title: Did Kobe Bryant fight over Brandy? Comedian Spanky Hayes shares a wild story about the late NBA legend at 17
Article Text:
Kobe Bryant and Brandy. Image via: Vinnie Zuffante/Getty Images

Spanky Hayes

Brandy

Comedian Spanky Hayes says Kobe Bryant had a fight with a singer over Brandy



Spanky Hayes. Image via: Paras Griffin/Getty Images

Comedianrecently shared an untold story about the late Kobe Bryant , claiming the basketball legend once got into a physical altercation over singer. During an appearance on the Kid L Podcast, Hayes recounted his time hanging out with a 17-year-old Bryant and revealed a surprising incident involving the NBA icon and his alleged romance story.Popular comedian Spanky Hayes recently shared a bombshell story about the late Kobe Bryant , revealing that he once had a romantic interest in singer Brandy.“I did a lot of background work for Moesha ,” Hayes recalled. “He [Bryant] went with Brandy, that was his girlfriend or they went to the prom or some sh*t. I see him sock Wanya from Boyz II Men in the mouth over her with a cast on… Kobe just took the b***h and socked him. Bam!”While there’s no way to confirm the story, it adds to the lore surrounding Bryant’s younger years before he became a five-time NBA champion. What is well-documented, however, is Bryant’s close connection with Brandy.Bryant and Brandy’s friendship dates back to 1996 when the two met at the Essence Awards. At the time, Brandy was a teenage R&B sensation and the star of Moesha, while Bryant was a high school basketball phenom on his way to the NBA. The two hit it off, and Bryant later asked Brandy to be his prom date.“He asked me to go to the prom with him, and since he was a nice guy … I asked my mom, and she said yes,” Brandy told the New York Daily News at the time.The decision made headlines, and Bryant’s prom night became a major spectacle. Held at the Bellevue Hotel in Philadelphia, the event required extra security to accommodate the influx of media attention. Brandy wore a champagne-colored Moschino dress with a matching shawl, while Bryant sported a sleek black tuxedo. The two arrived in a limo, and despite the initial buzz, classmates later described the evening as relatively normal once the couple got past the press.“Once they got past the press, people just treated it like, ‘Oh, hi, Brandy,’” recalled classmate Dan Gross.Despite their chemistry, Brandy has clarified over the years that the two never officially dated. However, their friendship remained strong, and just months after the prom, Bryant made a guest appearance on Moesha, playing a high school basketball player.Bryant’s legacy extends far beyond his high school years and his brief Hollywood ties. Tragically, he passed away on January 26, 2020, in a helicopter crash that also claimed the life of his 13-year-old daughter, Gianna, and seven others.In the wake of his passing, Brandy paid tribute by sharing a heartfelt image of Bryant and Gianna on Instagram, writing, “Never will I understand. My condolences to @vanessabryant, and all families who are in pain during this tragic time.”Also Read: Legacy or Business: Fans Find Vanessa Bryant and Nike Guilty of Milking Kobe Bryant's Name for Monetary Gains Now, five years after his untimely death, Bryant's impact continues to be felt, not just in basketball but across the world.
Article Summary: Comedian spanky hayes says kobe bryant had a fight with a singer over brandy. The two met in 1996 when brandy was a teenage r&b sensation and the star of moesha. Despite their chemistry, brandy has clarified that the two never officially dated.

Article Title: “F**k LeBron James!” Actor Spanky Hayes calls out the King while remembering Kobe Bryant’s legacy
Article Text:
Spanky Hayes and LeBron James. Image via: Paras Griffin | Ronald Martinez/ Getty Images

Spanky Hayes

Spanky Hayes shares that he is not a fan of LeBron James

LeBron James. Image via: Getty Images

Spanky Hayes on Leaving Illuminati, Michael Jackson Deep Voice, Jamie Foxx Beef | Kid L Podcast #503

Popular Comedian and actorrecently called out Los Angeles Lakers' legendary star power LeBron James while recalling the legacy of Kobe Bryant . The comedian did not hold anything back to share his thoughts on King James as he directly dropped an F-bomb on arguably the Greatest of All Time, who shares the spotlight of the accolade alongside Michael Jordan. LeBron James has an enormous fanbase as he has built his astonishing career over the years being one of the elite, arguably one of the best in the NBA right now. With his stupendous global fanbase, James has also gained an immense number of critics who have been scrutinizing his legacy. Comedian Spanky Hayes recently shared that he has been one of James’ critics. “F**k LeBron James!” the actor/comedian said during his appearance on the Kid L Podcast. “I hate people all on his d**k like that,” he added.Hayes also acknowledged James' achievements and his legacy-enriched career. “LeBron James is cool. He one of the GOATs, he’s a phenomenal player,” he said. However, he was never on Hayes team, which could be the reason for his hatred for the Lakers legend. “He’s just never on my team so f**k him.”“So, him I don't like LeBron James. I don't think you should celebrate if you went somewhere 10 times and only got in four that's not enough to brag about,” he continued.“He went to the dance 10 times, only won four, now one of my top three players, Stephen Curry beat LeBron James three times. They got the same amount of rings, four, but Stephen Curry won on LeBron three times,” Hayes shared, acknowledging the Golden State Warriors star player Stephen Curry Curry received further praise from the comedian, but according to Hayes, he will never meet the legacy of the late Kobe Bryant . “I'll say this he will not retire with more rings than Kobe Bryant will say it is that Stephen Curry is going to have more rings when he retire than LeBron,” Hayes shared.He further shared that he has been a Warriors fan and hailed the team’s decision to bring Jimmy Butler onboard from Miami Heat in a recent blockbuster trade. “Hey just got Jimmy Butler and they're going to get the Greek Freak next year they keep saying they keep tagging at him I'm a Warriors fan.”Also Read: Did Kobe Bryant fight over Brandy? Comedian Spanky Hayes shares a wild story about the late NBA legend at 17 Will Giannis Antetokounmpo join the Warriors? While Hayes makes bold predictions, it is unlikely that the Milwaukee Bucks would trade him anytime soon, or the Greek Freak has showed no interest to move from his team as of now. Regardless, the Warriors have been in their A-game in their recent matchups, especially after acquiring Butler. As for James, he has been on his brilliant form as well. The Lakers legend is averaging 24.8 points per game, 8.0 rebounds, and 8.6 assists.
Article Summary: Comedian and actor spanky hayes called out los angeles lakers' legendary star power lebron james. The comedian did not hold anything back to share his thoughts on king james as he directly dropped an f-bomb on arguably the greatest of all time. Hayes also acknowledged james' achievements and his legacy-enriched career.

Article Title: Who is Ronda Rousey’s husband Travis Browne? Exploring the personal details of the athletic couple
Article Text:
Travis Browne and Ronda Rousey. Image via Amanda Edwards/WireImage

Travis Browne

Who is Travis Browne?

Travis Browne’s journey at the UFC

Personal life of Travis Browne

What does Travis Browne currently do now?

Athletic couples are the highlight of any sport, and they add to increasing the interest of the fans in those particular genres. Ronda Rousey and her husbandare one such couple that constantly garners the curiosity of the fans. Married since 2017, both of them are mixed martial artists and former UFC fighters. Today they are the proud parents of two daughters, La'akea Makalapuaokalanipō and Liko’ula Pā’ūomahinakaipiha.A retired American fighter, Travis Browne ended his career competing as a heavyweight in the UFC. Born in Hawaii in 1982, Browne was initially into basketball and even won the 2000 Coastal North League Player of the Year while he was still in high school. Browne had no experience in MMA until he was introduced to Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu at the age of 26. Shortly after, with added training in boxing, Browne made his first debut in his professional MMA career in 2009. At the very onset, he secured a 9-0 winning streak across promotions like the Bellator Fighting Championship, Gladiator Challenge, and King of the Cage.Travis Browne's journey at the UFC was marked by both noted wins and tough setbacks. His UFC debut was in the year 2010 against James McSweeney, the result of which was in the former’s favor via TKO. His first defeat was handed to him by Antonio Silva at the UFC on FX: Browne vs. Bigfoot.Despite the first professional loss, Browne managed to secure dominant wins over elite fighters such as Alistair Overeem and Josh Barnett. His aggressive style and striking ability made him a serious title contender. However, a pivotal loss to Fabricio Werdum in 2014 at the UFC on FOX title eliminator slowed him down.Following this, Browne struggled to regain his dominance. Despite giving in his best efforts, he faced a series of defeats against top-ranking fighters, including Cain Velasquez and Derrick Lewis.By 2017, Browne had lost four consecutive fights, leading to his departure from the UFC. Though Browne couldn’t secure the heavyweight title, his tenure was marked by his aggressive skills and approach, making him one of the strongest title contenders in the division.Before getting married to Rousey, Travis Browne was previously married to Jenna Renee Webb. The marriage eventually broke off pertaining to certain accusations put on Browne by Webb on the lines of domestic violence. These allegations, which were later on proved to be false, severely affected his career, ranging to his removal from the UFC’s International Fight Week. The couple separated in 2016 despite sharing two sons, Kaleo and Keawe.Soon after Browne met Rousey, and they started dating in 2015. The couple officially announced their engagement in 2017 after Browne proposed to Rousey under a waterfall in New Zealand. Browne and Rousey had their first daughter in the year 2021, followed by a second daughter on the 9th of January 2025.Both Travis Browne and Ronda Rousey are retired MMA fighters. While Browne retired after facing repeated defeats, Rousey had an early retirement due to several concussions to her head. The couple currently owns two ranches—one in Oregon and the other one in California. Rousey even took to her Instagram to showcase how the couple practices regenerative farming, emphasizing the importance of sustainable practices.Both Browne and Rousey are now gearing up for the next big step in their lives, which will be opening a dojo for the kids to come and learn for free.Also Read: Five best MMA stars to watch in 2025: Islam Makhachev, Alex Pereira and more Travis Browne made an impressive start to his career. However, the circumstances were not in his favor, and he had to bring an early end to it. However, having settled down with Rousey, his life has got new purposes in the form of sustainable farming practices as well as imparting combat sports knowledge to those willing. Apart from all these, Browne loves to cook.
Article Summary: Travis browne and ronda rousey have been married since 2017. The couple are the proud parents of two daughters, la'akea makalapuaokalanipō and liko’ula pā’ūomahinakaipiha. Both browne and rousey are retired mma fighters.
